File formats contained in package: xml, zip, ppt, pptx, pdf, xlsl
Free text description of capture process: Metadata was generated by viewing page and using spreadsheet descriptions where necessary, data was bulk downloaded from the page using wget.
Name of resource: Database of State Incentives for Renewables & Efficiency
recommended_approach:
DSIRE makes archives of their data available here: http://www.dsireusa.org/resources/database-archives/
They also make publications available here: http://www.dsireusa.org/resources/presentations-and-publications/
And they produce maps available here: http://www.dsireusa.org/resources/detailed-summary-maps/
I recommend watching those pages and downloading new files as they are posted.
